  • Method Details

    • setRequiredPlayers

      public void setRequiredPlayers(int requiredPlayers) throws DisconnectedException
      Description copied from interface: LobbyController
      Set the required amount of players this game needs to start

      If the requiredPlayers params is set to 0, then in means that the server will start the game as soon as there are more than 2 players and all the ones in the lobby are ready.

      This method can only be called by the creator of the lobby. The server assumes the check is also done by the client and will therefore kick anyone else attempting to call this when not allowed.

      Specified by:
      setRequiredPlayers in interface LobbyController
      Parameters:
      requiredPlayers - num of required players. Must be 0 or between LobbyView.MIN_PLAYERS and LobbyView.MAX_PLAYERS
      Throws:
      DisconnectedException - if the connection is lost during the call

    • ready

      public void ready(boolean ready) throws DisconnectedException
      Description copied from interface: LobbyController
      Set whether this player is ready to start the game or not

      The game will start only when at least Lobby.requiredPlayers() number of players are ready.

      Specified by:
      ready in interface LobbyController
      Parameters:
      ready - true if this player is ready to start the game
      Throws:
      DisconnectedException - if the connection is lost during the call
